Cannabis Industry Experience

To Get You Up and Going Quickly at Minimal Cost

Cannabis Experience for Your Benefit

For Rapid Deployment of Your Laboratory

At TCL we are equipped with a fully competent and ready staff that will support you in all major aspects of laboratory creation, development, final accreditation and post support. You will have a cannabis laboratory up and running fast and efficient with little or no research and development time for quick entry into the cannabis industry. Our basic package will ensure that your lab meets the testing requirements as established in your state of choice. Additional services and/or upgrades can be added at your request.

TCL wants to assure you have the laboratory testing abilities you truly want. In addition our team can help you develop satellite facilities for your laboratory in markets you are looking to enter at a later date for an additional fee. These satellite facilities can be scheduled as separate projects upon your request. We offer specialized solutions based on the needs of the client. Feel free to contact us today for more information for starting your laboraroy for the purpose of testing cannabis.

TCL Advantage

We Employ a Two-Phase Process

To get you up and running in a timely fashion, compliant with all requirements of state rules and accrediation protocols.

Pre-Accrediation

Our pre-accrediation phase is focuses on the laboratory site & layout, position hiring, laboratory and office equipment installation, and business and marketing accounts and setup. This crucial phase brings in the physical assets that will be needed to get your lab running as well as implementation of Quality Systems and Standard Operating Procedures. This is to prepare the laboratory for the requirements of keeping compliant with the state regulators and accrediation bodies.

Post-Accrediation

Once accreditation has been obtained, TCL provides a QA capacity to provide feedback for laboratory compliance, and what corrective actions may be required. This phase is implemented, in part, by performing quartly audits. The reports generated from these audits detail issues with CAR's and PAR's (Corrective Action Reviews and Preventative Action Reviews). We also provide 6 months advisory services to the Board of the new laboratory.
